Portraits

Photography

Lately, I have noticed myself falling more distinctly in love with expression and tone. And creating such while highlighting the core of a person. There are many ways to describe someone. When confined to a single image or short series, the challenge becomes exponentially more fun. The portraits I resonate with most, and seek to create, contain an unmistakable connection that strikes you, intrigues you, or makes you feel like you know the subject well. (Donâ€™t) Smile.
